metadata.name: Rostam's Seven Labours
metadata.description:
This voxel illustration is inspired by the epic poem of Shahnameh,  "Rostams Seven Labours"
The Seven Labours of Rostam are a series of acts carried out by the greatest of the Iranian heroes, Rostam, The story is retold by Ferdowsi in his epic poem, Shahnameh.
The Seven Labours are seven difficult tasks undertaken by Rostam, accompanied, in most instances, only by his faithful and sagacious steed "Rakhsh"

1-the battle of Rakhsh with lion
2-Crossing the desert without water and grass
3- killing the dragon 
4-killing the witch 
5-capturing Olaad
6-Killing Arjang Demon
7- killing the white Demon
